Narrative: Pre-crash movement through telematics data shows the Lucid vehicle proceeding straight driving 80 mph Eastbound in lane 1 on [XXX] (speed limit is 45 mph) on June [XXX], 2023. Initial information indicated one or both vehicles were towed away, though no information was included about injuries. A second before impact, the driver applies the brake pedal and provides steering wheel input to the right, then to the left, and finally to the right before impact. The telematics data shows the vehicle heading East on [XXX] and the crash signal occurs in the Northeast corner of the [XXX] ([XXX]), the speed of the Lucid Vehicle is logged at 53mph. Telematics data shows the driver airbag deployed.  On [XXX], a conversation with the towing company employee occurred in which the employee stated that the Lucid vehicle was cut off by an oncoming vehicle, a Chevy Crew Cab Pickup truck heading Westbound on [XXX]. The truck was turning left onto [XXX] and the Lucid vehicle impacted the rear right of the truck. The towing company employee stated that people involved in the accident were transported to the hospital for medical treatment.
